item.title: Building this blog part I: Going Hugo
item.description: If you want to make a blog like this one, here’s how to do it. I’m also noting it down for my own use, in case I need to replicate my setup again. Hugo’s straightforward enough that anyone new to it (like me) can quickly be effective with it.
